outline:
1. to purify, select, polish, choose, purge, cleanse or make bright, test or prove
    1. (Qal)
      1. to purge, purge out, purify
      2. to choose, select
      3. to cleanse, make shining, polish
      4. to test, prove
    2. (Niphal) to purify oneself
    3. (Piel) to purify
    4. (Hiphil)
      1. to purify
      2. to polish arrows
    5. (Hithpael)
      1. to purify oneself
      2. to show oneself pure, just, kind
kjv_def: make bright, choice, chosen, cleanse (be clean), clearly, polished, (shew self) pure(-ify), purge (out).
